segments.text: Would you like some more coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No thanks . I'm full . We need to find our waitress and get our bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The waitress is bringing the bill right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This waitress has really been on top of things , hasn't she ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , this waitress did a great job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , let's see what the damage is . The total for our meal is $ 36.00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think would be the right amount to leave for a tip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fifteen percent is a normal tip , but she really did a great job . What do you think about 20 % this time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Her tip will end up being $ 7.20 plus the bill of $ 36.00 . The total will be $ 43.20 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that was one fantastic meal !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . Maybe we can come back again next week .
segments.speaker: S2
